name: Turn Spirit Weapon
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ an Upgraded Inamorata or Sacrosanct Weapon (#L "see here" "/tell recipe 108") eg: #L "Sacrosanct Bhotaar Blaster" "212247" #L "Turn Spirit Flesh Pouch" "246236" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Extract a Turn Spirit from the Turn Spirit Flesh Pouch by right clicking on it. Turn Spirit + an Upgraded Inamorata or Sacrosanct Weapon = a Turn Spirit weapon (eg: #L "Metropolis Blaster" "214201") Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Further upgrade your Inamorata or Sacrosanct Weapons.
